title: Three Guys Named Mike 1951 | Jane Wyman, Van Johnson, Howard Keel (Comedy, Romance) American film

sources.title: Three Guys Named Mike 1951 | Jane Wyman, Van Johnson, Howard Keel (Comedy, Romance) American film
sources.description:
Which Mike will she choose?
A stewardess becomes romantically involved with an airline pilot, a college professor, and a successful businessmanâ€¦all of whom are named Mike. When the three find out about each other, she has to decide which one she loves the most.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/jy7uhfy33tI


Original title: Three Guys Named Mike (1951)

Director: Charles Walters
Writers: Sidney Sheldon, Ruth Brooks Flippen, Ethel Wells 
Stars: Jane Wyman, Van Johnson, Howard Keel, Barry Sullivan
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:25 A young woman named Marcy prepares to become an airline stewardess, facing rejection but showing determination and enthusiasm.
07:20 A group of stewardesses embark on their first flights, facing challenges and forming connections.
18:20 A comedic and romantic film featuring a stewardess causing chaos on a flight to Nashville.
28:42 A chance encounter on a flight leads to a charming conversation about stars, dogs, and VIP passengers.
42:59 Four women plan to share a house due to a housing shortage, discuss over lunch, and prepare to look for a new home.
44:00 Three individuals interact in Chicago, discussing a scientist and advertising, leading to dinner invitations and missed connections.
50:18 Three individuals named Mike help a family move into a new house, showcasing their camaraderie and helpfulness.
56:33 Three men help a woman move, leading to a dinner invitation and a scientific demonstration in a comedy romance film.
1:07:21 A young woman named Marcy impresses a group with her advertising idea for Gardenia soap.
1:13:23 Unexpected visit from the airline president leads to praise for Marcy's exceptional work in public relations.
1:16:39 A chaotic evening unfolds during an advertising campaign, involving a stewardess, a photographer, and a pilot.
1:23:19 Romantic comedy film where Marcy faces career and love dilemmas involving three men named Mike.
1:33:21 Opportunities for starting a business with SMC, offering support, resources, and high-profit products.
